name: Men's Room Mayhem
description:
Become the janitor of your very own chaotic men’s room. Direct patrons, steer them away from trouble and keep everywhere sparkling clean! Get your customers safely to the urinals and cubicles in time – otherwise there’ll be a few nasty accidents to clean up! Extra points are scored for maintaining proper men’s room etiquette, avoiding fights and for demonstrating good personal hygiene.

1 player(s)
Network Features
1024KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
